metadata.Title: CVE-2022-43071 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A stack overflow in the Catalog::readPageLabelTree2(Object*) function of XPDF v4.04 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted PDF file.

notes.Note: ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
